CONVERSATION GROUP: I thought I told you to leave me alone.

They found us. They paid us, it wasn't our idea.

Gold. They use our caves to launch ambush.  Not supposed to bring you back.
Running. If they find out you alive.  They come back to cave to finish us.
I was not part of attack, please don't kill.
BK cut "  Pray we don't meet again." because this was the "nice response"
